thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 15 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Lancashire Says Q4 Gross Premiums Written Decreased By 29.1%

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Lancashire Says Q4 Gross Premiums Written Decreased By 29.1%
text:
Feb 15 (Reuters) - Lancashire Holdings Ltd:
* FINAL DIVIDEND 0.10 USD PER SHARE * ‍GROSS PREMIUMS WRITTEN DECREASED BY 29.1% IN Q4 OF 2017 COMPARED TO SAME PERIOD IN 2016​
* NET PREMIUMS EARNED AS A PROPORTION OF NET PREMIUMS WRITTEN WAS 179.5% IN Q4 OF 2017 COMPARED TO 145.5% FOR SAME PERIOD IN 2016​
* ‍INTERIM DIVIDEND OF $0.05 PER COMMON SHARE​ * ‍DECLARED A FINAL DIVIDEND FOR 2017 OF $0.10 PER COMMON SHARE​
* ‍FULLY CONVERTED BOOK VALUE PER SHARE OF $5.48 AS AT 31 DECEMBER 2017​
* EXPECT 2018 TO BE ANOTHER CHALLENGING YEAR FOR OUR INDUSTRY- CEO Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Bangalore.newsroom@thomsonreuters.com)
